subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Athletics and Sports
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The best-of-seven series is now tied, 2-2, after Teemu Selanne snapped out of his scoring slump with a goal and two assists for the Ducks.
snippet: The best-of-seven series is now tied, 2-2, after Teemu Selanne snapped out of his scoring slump with a goal and two assists for the Ducks.
